title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Revolutionize Your Computing Experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse!

Do you desire precision and comfort in one sleek package? Look no further than the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017, the trackball mouse that combines functionality with stylish design. Available in vibrant red, classic gray, and pristine white, this mouse adds a touch of elegance to any workstation.

Key Features:
- Smooth Trackball: Say goodbye to repetitive wrist movements. The Trackman Marble features a responsive trackball that ensures accurate cursor movement with minimal effort, reducing strain and enhancing productivity.
- Dual Connectivity: With both PS/2 and USB options, enjoy the versatility to connect to a wide range of devices. Whether you have a modern setup or an older system, the Trackman Marble has you covered.
- Precision Control: A consistent 300 DPI offers you precise control for detailed tasks, whether you're navigating spreadsheets or engaged in graphic design.
- Ambidextrous Design: Designed for comfort, the Trackman Marble caters to both left-handed and right-handed users, ensuring an ergonomic experience for all.
- Side-to-Side Scrolling: Navigate through documents and web pages with ease using the intuitive side-to-side scrolling feature, a testament to Logitech's commitment to enhanced user experience.
- Compact Size: With dimensions of 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this mouse is perfectly sized for any desk setup without sacrificing comfort.

Whether you're an office professional seeking efficiency or a home user looking for a comfortable computing experience, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is your gateway to improved productivity and comfort. Experience the future of mouse technology today!

Order your Logitech Trackman Marble and take the first step towards a more comfortable and controlled computing experience. Your wrists will thank you!

**Experience Precision and Comfort in Every Click with Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse!**

Are you tired of the conventional mouse that strains your hand after hours of use? Switch to the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse and enjoy a blend of innovation and comfort! This unique trackball mouse, available in vibrant red, sleek gray, or pristine white, is designed to provide unparalleled control and ease for both right-handed and left-handed users.

**Key Features:**

- **Superb Connectivity:** With dual PS/2 and USB connectivity, this mouse offers versatile plug-and-play options for virtually any computer setup, ensuring you're always ready to work or play.
  
- **Smooth Precision:** A 300 DPI sensor ensures that every movement is captured with the accuracy you need for graphic design, gaming, or simply browsing the web.
  
- **Ambidextrous Design:** Thoughtfully crafted for comfort, the Logitech Trackman Marble is suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users, making it a perfect choice for any individual.
  
- **Innovative Trackball Technology:** Say goodbye to arm fatigue. The built-in trackball lets you navigate your cursor without moving your arm, providing a relaxed and ergonomic experience.
  
- **Intuitive Scrolling:** Featuring side-to-side scrolling, you can navigate through your documents and web pages with ease, enhancing your efficiency and productivity.
  
- **Compact and Portable:** Measuring just 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this mouse is designed to fit comfortably in any workspace without clutter.
  
- **Simple and Reliable:** With 2 easy-to-use buttons, this mouse offers simplicity and reliability, perfect for both professional and casual use.

Proudly made in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is a testament to Logitech's commitment to quality and innovation. Whether you're working on long projects or enjoying your favorite games, this mouse is built to ensure comfort and precision every step of the way.

Don't wait any longer to upgrade your computer experience. Embrace the future of navigation with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse‚Äîyour hand will thank you!

**Get yours today and click with confidence and style!**

Discover precision and comfort with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, a timeless innovation designed to enhance your computing experience. Whether you're tackling a day at the office or diving into your favorite online game, this trackball mouse offers superior control and ergonomic design for both left and right-handed users.

- Compact and Portable: With dimensions of 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, it's the perfect size for any desk setup and easy to take on the go.
- Enhanced Features: Enjoy the convenience of side-to-side scrolling and a robust trackball that ensures you won't have to move your arm to move your cursor.
- Simple Setup: Two buttons provide straightforward functionality while the plug-and-play setup means you'll be up and running in no time.

Proudly made in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble Trackball Mouse combines functionality with style.
